text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Import all the codes that are contained in RouteByMethod
  • Import all the codes that are contained in RouteBySite
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RouteOfAdministration

name: RouteOfAdministration
title: RouteOfAdministration
description: The path the administered medication takes to get into the body or into contact with the body.
